statements: UPDATE learning_materials SET title='Introduction to SQL', type='Tutorial' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE learning_materials SET content=decode('5468697320697320616e206578616d706c6520436f6e74656e74', 'hex') WHERE title='Introduction to SQL';
UPDATE learning_materials SET title='Advanced SQL Tutorial', type='Document' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE learning_materials SET material_title = 'Updated Title 1' WHERE material_id = 'c48d00d8-5d92-4a85-9f96-d0a01450a901';
UPDATE quizzes SET quiz_questions = '{"1": "Question 1", "2": "Question 2"}' WHERE quiz_id = '0044a45a-a7a4-4295-937a-0f1d23f7822e';
UPDATE learning_materials SET material_title = 'Updated Title', material_type = 'Document', material_file = BYTEA_ENCODE('New File') WHERE material_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';

UPDATE quizzes SET quiz_questions = '{"question": "What is your favorite color?", "options": ["Red", "Blue", "Green"]}', quiz_title = 'Updated Quiz Title' WHERE quiz_id = '890abcdef-12d3-45de-5678-90abcdef1234';
UPDATE lecture_slides SET slide_title='Introduction to SQL', slide_content='SQL basics', lecture_id=1 WHERE slide_id=1;
UPDATE quizzes SET question_count=10, quiz_title='SQL Quiz' WHERE quiz_id=1;
UPDATE lecture_slides SET slide_content = 'Updated content' WHERE slide_id = 1;
UPDATE videos SET video_length = 120, video_url = 'https://updated_video_url.com' WHERE video_id = 3;
UPDATE slides SET slide_title = 'Introduction to SQL' WHERE slide_id = 1;
UPDATE courses SET enroll_count = enroll_count + 10 WHERE course_id = 101;
UPDATE slides SET slide_title = 'Introduction to Databases', slide_content = 'In this lesson, we will cover the basics of databases' WHERE slide_id = 1;
UPDATE quizzes SET quiz_questions = '1. What is a database? 2. What are the different types of databases? 3. Why are databases important?' WHERE quiz_id = 3;
UPDATE lecture_slides SET title='Updated Lecture Slide Title', content='New Content' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE videos SET duration=60, title='Updated Video Title' WHERE id=2;
UPDATE lecture_slides SET content = 'Updated content for Lecture 1' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE videos SET duration = 120, title = 'New Video Title' WHERE id = 2;
